name: A Generic RPG - Benbonk Game Jam
name_original: A Generic RPG - Benbonk Game Jam
description: The Game Jam theme was "Trust No One".  This is my first time participating in a game jam.   The game made in Godot, music in LMMS, and pixel art in Aseprite.  There are some lighting bugs, but they should not affect gameplay. I hope you enjoy!
